DOC.brief_summary: The study non-randomized , open label , single dose , placebo control , single center , single arm study healthy subject . The study include one administration placebo four single administration Oshadi D two different dose level , administer two feed regimen evaluation influence food Oshadi D absorption .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Influence Food Regimen Oshadi D Absorption
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male/female 21 year old . Subject must understand willing give write informed consent prior study procedure evaluation willing adhere study schedule requirement . Subject must sterile infertile use approve method contraception time first dose study medication take three month follow study completion discontinuation . Any history significant cardiac , renal , neurologic , metabolic , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , hematologic abnormality , chronic hepatic disease disease judgment investigator would interfere study confound result . Subject positive HIV serology positive HBsAg screening . History evidence active liver disease . Female subject breastfeed positive pregnancy test screening time study . Inability give write informed consent History alcohol drug abuse within 6 month screen . Subject positive urine drug screen substance abuse ( benzodiazepine , THC , opiates , amphetamine , cocaine ) screening . Mental disorder . Subject poor venous access Significant swallowing disorder Digestive disorder ; Small bowel surgery ; Mall absorption disorder .
